name: prof dr horst fischer
goal: Identify EU policies with relevance for external action, business and development, publish on relevant legal actions and cooperate with stakeholders in Brussels and other European Union member states as well as with UN institutions
interests: Borders and Security, Climate Action, Competition, Economy, finance and the euro, European Neighbourhood Policy, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Trade
euInitiatives: Initiatives in DEVE, AFET and  MFF and budgetary planning beyond 2020, budgetary affairs, SME EU actions human rights, access to justice
